sources.title: Wild Youth (1960) CAROL OHMART
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Carol Ohmart, Robert Hutton, Steve Rowland
Director: John F. Schreyer

A trio of juvenile delinquents hitch a ride with the wrong hitman and his junkie girlfriend. And let's not forget the doll stuffed with heroin. Sizzlin' Jazzy score!

metadata.Plot: Originally release to theatres in the U.S. and Canada as "Wild Youth." - Escaping from a detention Honor Farm in New Mexico, "Swith" (Steve Rowland) and Frankie (Robert Arthur) find refuge with Donna (Jan Brooks), a farm girl who is all of sweet-sixteen, and is in love with Frankie. But "Switch". an expert with a switchblade knife is a constant menace to the romance. When their beat-up jalopy breaks down they hitchhike a ride with Revis (John Goddard), a killer and dope peddler wanted by the U.S. Border Patrol and the Mexican Rurales. With Revis is his dope-crazed moll, Madge (Carol Ohmart). In an ensuing conflict between Revie and "Switch" for a huge doll stuffed with dope (other than Madge),the border police are closing in. Video titles changed to "Naked Youth."
metadata.Writer: Robert J. Black Jr., Lester Wm. Berke, Dean Romano
metadata.Actors: Robert Hutton, John Goddard, Carol Ohmart
